title: China's Control on America's Bibles.
description:
This week we will look into how China is using its power to control American Bibles. This is an interesting development coming out of China and something that those in the United States should be aware of. 

Make Sure to Like and Subscribe!

--Links--
Article: https://www.firstthings.com/web-exclusives/2020/12/chinas-threat-to-the-bible
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
